publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2020 Murdo Fraser: HBOS/Barnardo’s Tug of War—That the Parliament notes that the fourth annual HBOS/Barnardo’s Tug of War Competition will take place on Wednesday 18 June 2008 in Holyrood Park, Edinburgh; recognises that last year’s event helped raise over £4,500 for Barnardo’s to use for its excellent charity work, and calls on all challengers to take their chances against the reigning three-time champions, the Scottish Conservatives.

S3M-2020 Murdo Fraser: HBOS/Barnardo’s Tug of War—That the Parliament notes that the fourth annual HBOS/Barnardo’s Tug of War Competition will take place on Wednesday 18 June 2008 in Holyrood Park, Edinburgh; recognises that last year’s event helped raise over £4,500 for Barnardo’s to use for its excellent charity work, and calls on all challengers to take their chances against the reigning three-time champions, the Scottish Conservatives.
S3M-2020 HBOS/Barnardo’s Tug of War (lodged on 29 May 2008) Jack McConnell*

S3M-2020 HBOS/Barnardo’s Tug of War (lodged on 29 May 2008) John Scott*, Jackson Carlaw*, Margaret Mitchell*, Stuart McMillan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Ted Brocklebank*, Hugh Henry*, Bob Doris*, Jamie McGrigor*, Elizabeth Smith*, Derek Brownlee*, John Park*, Mike Pringle*, Nanette Milne*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Bill Aitken*, John Lamont*, Alex Johnstone*, Alasdair Allan*, Annabel Goldie*, Angela Constance*
S3M-2020 HBOS/Barnardo’s Tug of War (lodged on 29 May 2008) Gil Paterson*, Andy Kerr*
